name: derpy tiger kpop demon hunters
notes:
"hello friend!"  this derpy tiger amigurumi loves to carry notes on his tongue and deliver messages to a special person.  inspired from k-pop demon hunters, this electric blue tiger is sure to cuddle its way into your heart while leaving you covered in notes!

this free crochet derpy tiger pattern features include an open mouth with fangs and a tongue, back stripes, and head markings. he also has an adorable tendency to try to fix things/items that are tipped over like a flower pot or trash can.

this is a continuation of my [open mouth amigurumi series][1], where i take the head base as a starting point and make all types of different amigurumis with it!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**approximate size:**4.5in tall by 4.5in long

i'd love to see how your derpy tiger turns out!

tag me with your projects on my [instagram @ami_amour][2]

you can also crochet along with me on the [derpy tiger video tutoria][3]l on my youtube channel.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


**level**: intermediate

**need to know:**
single crochet
decrease
increase
half double crochet
double crochet
chain
slip stitch
color change


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/bundles/open-mouth-amigurumi-series
  [2]: https://www.instagram.com/ami_amour
  [3]: https://youtu.be/6pgoghsinss
